name: Customer Circuit Reference
title: CKR
definition: Identifies the circuit number or range of circuit numbers being used by the customer.
usageNotes: Required when the CKR field on the ASR Form is populated, otherwise prohibited.
fieldNotes: CKR is used by the customer as a cross reference to the provider circuit ID(s) and in many cases to identify the customerâ€™s end-to-end service.
